module.name: file_identification
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of one of possibly multiple digital file(s) on a computer system, or the physical realization of a document definition.
Paper plots of technical drawings, micro fiche, or floppy disks are examples of non-digital files.

inscope.li: Identification of digital files, such as a file on a computer system;
Identification of a physical file, such as a stack of paper.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the identification of digital or physical files.

uof.name: File_Identification
uof.description: The File_Identification UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of identifying possibly multiple digital file(s) on a computer system, or the actual stack of paper (hardcopy) that are the constituent files that make up a document definition.
